column1: Little Goat Diner////After lots of going back and forth
column2: I finally decided to save the breakfast menu for a future Little Goat visit. I figured a burger would be a safe way to go
column3: so I ordered one of the many options. I don't remember now which one it was
column4: but it had a fried egg on the top. It was excellent. Not overly salty or overly anything. I would want to try something else next time
column5: though. I was a bit disappointed by the brussels sprouts because they were very strong-tasting. I think it was some kind of oil or vinegar they were bathed in
column6: but the taste was overwhelmingly salty. This is coming from someone who adds salt to things that were already salted
column7: so you know I'm being serious when I say it was way too salty.
